August 31, 1962
Mr, Richard B. Hull
Executive Director
Telecommunications Center
Ohio State University
2470 N. Starr Road
Columbus 21, Ohio
Dear Dick:
The NAEB Convention officially opens on Monday, However, the Board of Directors
will meet Sunday, October 21, at 2 p.m. and 7 p.m. The Opening Business Session
is scheduled for 10:00 a.m., Monday, October 22. The banquet is scheduled for
7:00 p.m., bednesday, Octbber 24, and this is the final official event of the
Convention. The Board of Directors will hold their final meeting 9:00 a.m.,
Thursday, the 25th, and, if it is necessary, will reconvene that afternoon.
I hope this information will be helpful as you make your plans.
Regarding the responsibilities of the Radio and TV Directors in each region â€”
Actually the TV Director is responsible for recruiting new TV members in the
region, for determining the needs and wants of the TV member stations, for
offering general assistance to the TV members and for serving as the general
contact person. The Radio Director has the same responsibilities toward the
radio members. In areas where the Directors should work together, i.e..
Regional Meetings, the senior Director should take the lead with the full
cooperation of the junior Director. Let me know if you have any further
questions along this line.
Sincerely,
Harold E. Hill
Vice President
